20110129114104.000|20110129114106.000|CC1|VIOLATIONS TAKING PLACE IN THE  
20110129114106.000|20110129114107.000|CC1|NORTH.                          
20110129114107.000|20110129114109.000|CC1|I THINK THAT IS CHANGING NOW.   
20110129114109.000|20110129114110.000|CC1|I THINK PEOPLE HAVE SEEN,       
20110129114110.000|20110129114113.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THE SHELLING OF      
20110129114113.000|20110129114118.000|CC1|YEONPYEONG ISLAND, WHICH IS SAD 
20110129114118.000|20110129114119.000|CC1|THAT IT TAKES THAT TO HAPPEN,   
20110129114119.000|20110129114122.000|CC1|BUT I THINK IT IS A CHANGE IN   
20110129114122.000|20110129114124.000|CC1|THE UNDERSTANDING OF THE THREAT 
20110129114124.000|20110129114127.000|CC1|POSED BY NORTH KOREA, AND I     
20110129114127.000|20110129114128.000|CC1|THINK WE SHOULD ALL TRY TO TAKE 
20110129114128.000|20110129114130.000|CC1|ADVANTAGE OF THAT.              
20110129114130.000|20110129114131.000|CC1|OK.                             
20110129114131.000|20110129114133.000|CC1|THANK YOU AGAIN VERY MUCH FOR   
20110129114133.000|20110129114133.000|CC1|COMING.

20110129114225.000|20110129114231.000|CC1|>> LAST NIGHT'S STATEMENT FROM  
20110129114231.000|20110129114232.000|CC1|EGYPTIAN PRESIDENT MUBARAK, HE  
20110129114232.000|20110129114234.000|CC1|MADE HIS FIRST TELEVISION       
20110129114234.000|20110129114235.000|CC1|APPEARANCE SINCE THE PROTESTS   
20110129114235.000|20110129114236.000|CC1|BEGAN.                          
20110129114236.000|20110129114238.000|CC1|HE SAID HE HAS AS HIS CABINET TO
20110129114238.000|20110129114238.000|CC1|RESIGN.                         
20110129114238.000|20110129114254.000|CC1|THIS IS ABOUT 10 MINUTES.       
20110129114254.000|20110129114259.000|CC1|>> I HAVE BEEN CLOSELY          
20110129114259.000|20110129114301.000|CC1|MONITORING THE DEMONSTRATIONS   
20110129114301.000|20110129114302.000|CC1|AND THE DEMANDS VOICED BY THE   
20110129114302.000|20110129114303.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129114303.000|20110129114304.000|CC1|MY INSTRUCTIONS TO THE          
20110129114304.000|20110129114310.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT STRESS THAT TO       
20110129114310.000|20110129114311.000|CC1|PROVIDE AN OPPORTUNITY TO THE   
20110129114311.000|20110129114314.000|CC1|MASSES NOT TO SUPPRESS THEIR    
20110129114314.000|20110129114316.000|CC1|VIEWS AND DEMANDS.              
20110129114316.000|20110129114318.000|CC1|I THEN FOLLOWED IT THE ATTEMPTS 
20110129114318.000|20110129114325.000|CC1|BY SOME TO JUMP ON THE WAGON AND
20110129114325.000|20110129114332.000|CC1|MONGER SLOGANS AND I REGRET THE 
20110129114332.000|20110129114334.000|CC1|INNOCENT CASUALTIES AND VICTIMS 
20110129114334.000|20110129114336.000|CC1|ON BOTH THE SIDE OF CITIZENS AND
20110129114336.000|20110129114340.000|CC1|POLICE PERSONNEL.               
20110129114340.000|20110129114342.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT COMMITTED TO MY  
20110129114342.000|20110129114344.000|CC1|INSTRUCTIONS AND THIS WAS CLEAR 
20110129114344.000|20110129114346.000|CC1|IN THE WAY THE POLICE HANDLE THE
20110129114346.000|20110129114348.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATIONS.                 
20110129114348.000|20110129114350.000|CC1|THEY TOOK THE INITIATIVE TO     
20110129114350.000|20110129114351.000|CC1|DEFEND THEM AT THE BEGINNING OF 
20110129114351.000|20110129114355.000|CC1|THE ADMINISTRATION, RESPECTING  
20110129114355.000|20110129114356.000|CC1|THEIR RIGHT OF PEACEFUL         
20110129114356.000|20110129114400.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATION SO LONG AS IT IS  
20110129114400.000|20110129114401.000|CC1|WITHIN THE PARAMETERS OF BAILOUT
20110129114401.000|20110129114406.000|CC1|LAW -- PARAMETERS OF A WHOLE    
20110129114406.000|20110129114409.000|CC1|LOT.                            
20110129114409.000|20110129114414.000|CC1|THE LAW.                        
20110129114414.000|20110129114421.000|CC1|THESE DEMONSTRATIONS AND WHAT WE
20110129114421.000|20110129114424.000|CC1|WITNESSED EARLIER IN THE RALLIES
20110129114424.000|20110129114426.000|CC1|STAGED OVER THE PAST FEW YEARS  
20110129114426.000|20110129114430.000|CC1|WOULDN'T HAVE TAKEN PLACE       
20110129114430.000|20110129114437.000|CC1|WITHOUT THE HUGE SPACE OF A     
20110129114437.000|20110129114438.000|CC1|FREEDOM OF THE PRESS AND MANY   
20110129114438.000|20110129114440.000|CC1|OTHER FORMS OF OF FREEDOM THAT  
20110129114440.000|20110129114442.000|CC1|WAS GRANTED TO THE EGYPTIAN     
20110129114442.000|20110129114447.000|CC1|PEOPLE BY THE REFORMS EGYPT IS  
20110129114447.000|20110129114450.000|CC1|EMBRACING AND THE UNPARALLELED  
20110129114450.000|20110129114454.000|CC1|JOINING OF THE FORCES OF        
20110129114454.000|20110129114455.000|CC1|SOCIETY.                        
20110129114455.000|20110129114458.000|CC1|IN MY CAPACITY AS PRESIDENT OF  
20110129114458.000|20110129114500.000|CC1|THE REPUBLIC AND BY A VIRTUAL   
20110129114500.000|20110129114502.000|CC1|ALL THE POWERS CONFERRED TO ME  
20110129114502.000|20110129114505.000|CC1|BY THE CONSTITUTION AS A JUDGE  
20110129114505.000|20110129114507.000|CC1|IN ARBITRATOR, I ALWAYS STRESS  
20110129114507.000|20110129114509.000|CC1|AND WILL CONTINUE TO REITERATE  
20110129114509.000|20110129114511.000|CC1|THAT SOVEREIGNTY WILL BE TO THE 
20110129114511.000|20110129114513.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND I WILL ALWAYS        
20110129114513.000|20110129114520.000|CC1|ADHERE TO DEFENDING THE RIGHT OF
20110129114520.000|20110129114522.000|CC1|FREEDOM SO LONG AS IT IS WITHIN 
20110129114522.000|20110129114526.000|CC1|THE PARAMETERS OF LAW AND THE   
20110129114526.000|20110129114527.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION.                   
20110129114527.000|20110129114530.000|CC1|THERE IS A FINE LINE SEPARATING 
20110129114530.000|20110129114532.000|CC1|FREEDOM FROM CHAOS.             
20110129114532.000|20110129114536.000|CC1|WHILE I TAKE THE SIDE OF        
20110129114536.000|20110129114537.000|CC1|CITIZENS FREEDOM TO EXPRESS     
20110129114537.000|20110129114542.000|CC1|THEIR VIEWS, BUT ALSO SIMILARLY 
20110129114542.000|20110129114546.000|CC1|ADHERE TO DEFENDING EGYPTIAN    
20110129114546.000|20110129114551.000|CC1|STABILITY AND SECURITY.         
20110129114551.000|20110129114554.000|CC1|I DON'T WANT TO STEER IT INTO   
20110129114554.000|20110129114558.000|CC1|ANY THREATS THAT MAY JEOPARDIZE 
20110129114558.000|20110129114601.000|CC1|PUBLIC SAFETY, PUBLIC ORDER     
20110129114601.000|20110129114604.000|CC1|WHOSE REPERCUSSIONS ON THE      
20110129114604.000|20110129114607.000|CC1|CURRENT AND FUTURE OF EGYPT IS  
20110129114607.000|20110129114608.000|CC1|UNPREDICTABLE.                  
20110129114608.000|20110129114611.000|CC1|EGYPT IS THE BIGGEST COUNTRY IN 
20110129114611.000|20110129114612.000|CC1|THE REGION IN TERMS OF THE      
20110129114612.000|20110129114616.000|CC1|POPULATION, GEOGRAPHICAL        
20110129114616.000|20110129114619.000|CC1|LOCATION.                       
20110129114619.000|20110129114620.000|CC1|COVERED BY THE CONSTITUTION AND 
20110129114620.000|20110129114621.000|CC1|THE RULE OF LAW.                
20110129114621.000|20110129114624.000|CC1|WE SHOULD BE CAUTIOUS AND AWARE 
20110129114624.000|20110129114628.000|CC1|OF THE MANY EXAMPLES AROUND US  
20110129114628.000|20110129114630.000|CC1|WHICH DROVE PEOPLE TO CHAOS AND 
20110129114630.000|20110129114633.000|CC1|MAYHEM.                         
20110129114633.000|20110129114635.000|CC1| THEY GAINED NO DEMOCRACY OR    
20110129114635.000|20110129114638.000|CC1|STABILITY.                      
20110129114638.000|20110129114640.000|CC1|MY FELLOW CITIZENS, THESE       
20110129114640.000|20110129114643.000|CC1|DEMONSTRATIONS CAME TO SUPPRESS 
20110129114643.000|20110129114648.000|CC1|THE ASPIRATIONS FOR MORE        
20110129114648.000|20110129114654.000|CC1|DEMOCRACIES AND SPEED ACTIONS TO
20110129114654.000|20110129114656.000|CC1|COMBAT UNEMPLOYMENT, RAISING THE
20110129114656.000|20110129114658.000|CC1|STANDARD OF LIVING AND FIGHTING 
20110129114658.000|20110129114700.000|CC1|POVERTY AND ADDRESSING          
20110129114700.000|20110129114703.000|CC1|CORRUPTION.                     
20110129114703.000|20110129114707.000|CC1|I AM FULLY AWARE OF THESE LOCAL 
20110129114707.000|20110129114707.000|CC1|ASPIRATIONS OF THE EGYPTIAN     
20110129114707.000|20110129114710.000|CC1|PEOPLE AND I AM ALSO AWARE OF   
20110129114710.000|20110129114714.000|CC1|THE DEGREE OF THEIR SUFFERING TO
20110129114714.000|20110129114717.000|CC1|WHICH I AM ALWAYS ATTACHED AND  
20110129114717.000|20110129114720.000|CC1|WORKING DAY AFTER DAY.          
20110129114720.000|20110129114723.000|CC1|HOWEVER, THE PROBLEMS FACING US 
20110129114723.000|20110129114728.000|CC1|AND THE GOALS SOUGHT BY S CANNOT
20110129114728.000|20110129114731.000|CC1|BE ACHIEVED BY VIOLENCE.        
20110129114731.000|20110129114734.000|CC1|THEY CAN ONLY BE ACHIEVED BY A  
20110129114734.000|20110129114740.000|CC1|NATIONAL DIALOGUE AND CONSCIOUS 
20110129114740.000|20110129114745.000|CC1|CONCERTED GENUINE EFFORTS.      
20110129114745.000|20110129114753.000|CC1|EGYPT LOOKS TO THEM TO LIVE UP  
20110129114753.000|20110129114756.000|CC1|TO STEER AWAY FROM THOSE WHO IN 
20110129114756.000|20110129114802.000|CC1|TICE CHAOS AND LOOTING PUBLIC   
20110129114802.000|20110129114803.000|CC1|AND PUBLIC-PRIVATE -- PUBLIC AND
20110129114803.000|20110129114806.000|CC1|PRIVATE PROPERTY.               
20110129114806.000|20110129114808.000|CC1|I HAVE A FIRM BELIEF AND        
20110129114808.000|20110129114809.000|CC1|CONVICTION THAT WE WILL         
20110129114809.000|20110129114813.000|CC1|CONTINUE OUR POLITICAL,         
20110129114813.000|20110129114817.000|CC1|ECONOMIC, AND SOCIAL REFORMS FOR
20110129114817.000|20110129114821.000|CC1|A FREE AND DEMOCRATIC EGYPTIAN  
20110129114821.000|20110129114822.000|CC1|SOCIETY, EMBRACING THE MODERN   
20110129114822.000|20110129114824.000|CC1|PRINCIPLES AND OPENING TO THE   
20110129114824.000|20110129114828.000|CC1|WORLD.                          
20110129114828.000|20110129114830.000|CC1|I HAVE TAKEN THE SIDE, AND WE   
20110129114830.000|20110129114832.000|CC1|WILL ALWAYS TAKE THE SIDE, OF   
20110129114832.000|20110129114836.000|CC1|THE POOR PEOPLE OF EGYPT        
20110129114836.000|20110129114841.000|CC1|CONVINCED THAT THE ECONOMY IS   
20110129114841.000|20110129114843.000|CC1|TOO DANGEROUS TO LEFT -- TO BE  
20110129114843.000|20110129114845.000|CC1|LEFT TO ECONOMISTS ON A LOAN.   
20110129114845.000|20110129114847.000|CC1|I'VE ALWAYS BEEN KEEN ON        
20110129114847.000|20110129114849.000|CC1|DIRECTING THE GOVERNMENT        
20110129114849.000|20110129114850.000|CC1|POLICIES TOWARDS ECONOMIC       
20110129114850.000|20110129114854.000|CC1|REFORMS TO BE EXPEDITED AND     
20110129114854.000|20110129114857.000|CC1|SPEEDED UP TO LIFT THE SUFFERING
20110129114857.000|20110129114858.000|CC1|OF THE PEOPLE.                  
20110129114858.000|20110129114902.000|CC1|OUR PLANS TO COMBAT UNEMPLOYMENT
20110129114902.000|20110129114904.000|CC1|AND PROVIDE MORE EDUCATIONAL    
20110129114904.000|20110129114906.000|CC1|SERVICES, HEALTH CARE, HOUSING, 
20110129114906.000|20110129114910.000|CC1|AND MANY OTHER SERVICES TO THE  
20110129114910.000|20110129114912.000|CC1|CITIZENS WILL REMAIN CONDITIONAL
20110129114912.000|20110129114918.000|CC1|ON OUR EFFORTS TO MAINTAIN EGYPT
20110129114918.000|20110129114919.000|CC1|AS SECURE AND STABLE, A HOME TO 
20110129114919.000|20110129114924.000|CC1|A CIVILIZED PEOPLE THAT CANNOT  
20110129114924.000|20110129114929.000|CC1|JEOPARDIZE ITS ASPIRATION TO THE
20110129114929.000|20110129114931.000|CC1|FUTURE OR LEAVE IT TO GO DOWN   
20110129114931.000|20110129114933.000|CC1|THE DRAIN.                      
20110129114933.000|20110129114940.000|CC1|WE WILL GO ABOUT THE ACTIONS OF 
20110129114940.000|20110129114941.000|CC1|LOOTING WHICH MAY INDICATE      
20110129114941.000|20110129114944.000|CC1|FURTHER PLOTS TO SHAKE THE      
20110129114944.000|20110129114946.000|CC1|FOUNDATION AND CIVILITY OF      
20110129114946.000|20110129114946.000|CC1|EGYPT.                          
20110129114946.000|20110129114948.000|CC1|I CALL AND OUR YOUTH AND CALL ON
20110129114948.000|20110129114954.000|CC1|EACH AND EVERY EGYPTIAN CITIZEN,
20110129114954.000|20110129114955.000|CC1|MAN AND WOMAN, TO WORK FOR THE  
20110129114955.000|20110129114956.000|CC1|PUBLIC INTEREST OF THE PEOPLE   
20110129114956.000|20110129114959.000|CC1|AND TO STAND UP FOR THEIR       
20110129114959.000|20110129115005.000|CC1|COUNTRY, NOT BY SITTING OR      
20110129115005.000|20110129115006.000|CC1|ASSAULTING PUBLIC PROPERTY, NOT 
20110129115006.000|20110129115008.000|CC1|BY THIS CAN WE ACHIEVE THE      
20110129115008.000|20110129115009.000|CC1|ASPIRATIONS OF EGYPT AND ITS    
20110129115009.000|20110129115011.000|CC1|PEOPLE.                         
20110129115011.000|20110129115013.000|CC1|THESE ASPIRATIONS CAN BE        
20110129115013.000|20110129115016.000|CC1|ACHIEVED FOR A BETTER FUTURE BY 
20110129115016.000|20110129115019.000|CC1|WAY OF AWARENESS, DIALOGUE, AND 
20110129115019.000|20110129115021.000|CC1|GENUINE EFFORTS FOR THE PUBLIC  
20110129115021.000|20110129115021.000|CC1|GOOD.                           
20110129115021.000|20110129115025.000|CC1|MY FELLOW CITIZENS, I ADDRESS   
20110129115025.000|20110129115031.000|CC1|YOU TODAY NOT ONLY AS THE       
20110129115031.000|20110129115032.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC BUT   
20110129115032.000|20110129115035.000|CC1|ALSO AS AN EGYPTIAN CITIZEN     
20110129115035.000|20110129115039.000|CC1|WHICH MY FAITH PUT ME UNDER THE 
20110129115039.000|20110129115041.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY OF THIS COUNTRY, 
20110129115041.000|20110129115043.000|CC1|AND EXHAUSTED MY LIFE FOR THE   
20110129115043.000|20110129115044.000|CC1|COUNTRY IN TIMES OF WAR AND     
20110129115044.000|20110129115046.000|CC1|PEACE.                          
20110129115046.000|20110129115052.000|CC1|WE HAVE WEATHERED HARD TIMES AND
20110129115052.000|20110129115054.000|CC1|SURMOUNTED THESE OBSTACLES WHEN 
20110129115054.000|20110129115058.000|CC1|WE STOOD UP FOR THEM, ONE       
20110129115058.000|20110129115100.000|CC1|PEOPLE, ONE NATION, AND WHEN WE 
20110129115100.000|20110129115102.000|CC1|WERE AWARE OF OUR DIRECTION AND 
20110129115102.000|20110129115104.000|CC1|OUR CAUSE AND SET OUR GOALS     
20110129115104.000|20110129115106.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20110129115106.000|20110129115107.000|CC1|THE GOALS TO REFORM WHICH WE    
20110129115107.000|20110129115113.000|CC1|HAVE EMBRACED WHICH HAS NO POINT
20110129115113.000|20110129115115.000|CC1|OF RETURN, WE WILL CONTINUE     
20110129115115.000|20110129115119.000|CC1|STEADILY BY NEW STEPS           
20110129115119.000|20110129115120.000|CC1|EMPHASIZING OUR RESPECT TO THE  
20110129115120.000|20110129115124.000|CC1|RULE OF LAW, NEW STEPS TOWARDS A
20110129115124.000|20110129115128.000|CC1|MORE DEMOCRACY, MORE FREEDOMS TO
20110129115128.000|20110129115132.000|CC1|CITIZENS.                       
20110129115132.000|20110129115137.000|CC1|NEW STEPS TO REDUCE             
20110129115137.000|20110129115138.000|CC1|UNEMPLOYMENT, RAISE THE STANDARD
20110129115138.000|20110129115141.000|CC1|OF LIVING, DEVELOP SERVICES, NEW
20110129115141.000|20110129115145.000|CC1|STEPS TO STAND BY THE SIDE OF   
20110129115145.000|20110129115146.000|CC1|THE POOR AND PEOPLE OF LOW      
20110129115146.000|20110129115148.000|CC1|INCOME.                         
20110129115148.000|20110129115153.000|CC1|OUR OPTIONS AND OUR GOALS WILL  
20110129115153.000|20110129115156.000|CC1|DEFINE THE SHAPE OF OUR FUTURE  
20110129115156.000|20110129115158.000|CC1|AND WE HAVE NO OTHER ALTERNATIVE
20110129115158.000|20110129115202.000|CC1|TO ACHIEVE THEM BUT TO EMBRACE  
20110129115202.000|20110129115208.000|CC1|GENUINE WORK AND STRUGGLE.      
20110129115208.000|20110129115209.000|CC1|WE WILL CONTINUE TO MAINTAIN    
20110129115209.000|20110129115211.000|CC1|WHAT WE HAVE EARNED AND EMBARKED
20110129115211.000|20110129115214.000|CC1|ON THIS, CAUTIOUS OF THE FUTURE 
20110129115214.000|20110129115216.000|CC1|OF THE NATION, THAT INCIDENTS   
20110129115216.000|20110129115218.000|CC1|THAT TOOK PLACE TODAY AND THE   
20110129115218.000|20110129115224.000|CC1|PAST FEW DAYS, HAVE LEFT THE    
20110129115224.000|20110129115226.000|CC1|MAJORITY OF THE EGYPTIAN PEOPLE 
20110129115226.000|20110129115229.000|CC1|FFEARING FOR EGYPT AND ITS      
20110129115229.000|20110129115232.000|CC1|FUTURE.                         
20110129115232.000|20110129115235.000|CC1|WE WILL BE CAUTIOUS OF FURTHER  
20110129115235.000|20110129115236.000|CC1|MESDAMES, CHAOS, AND THE        
20110129115236.000|20110129115241.000|CC1|DESTRUCTION.                    
20110129115241.000|20110129115243.000|CC1|I AM SHOULDERING MY FIRST       
20110129115243.000|20110129115246.000|CC1|RESPONSIBILITY TO MAINTAIN THE  
20110129115246.000|20110129115247.000|CC1|HOMELAND SECURITY AND THE       
20110129115247.000|20110129115251.000|CC1|CITIZENS' SAFETY, CANNOT        
20110129115251.000|20110129115252.000|CC1|TOLERATE OR ALLOW THIS FEAR TO  
20110129115252.000|20110129115257.000|CC1|GRIP OUR PEOPLE AND THEREFORE, I
20110129115257.000|20110129115301.000|CC1|WOULD NOT ALLOW THIS TO HAUNT   
20110129115301.000|20110129115303.000|CC1|OUR FUTURE AND OUR FAITH.       
20110129115303.000|20110129115306.000|CC1|I HAVE REQUESTED THE GOVERNMENT 
20110129115306.000|20110129115309.000|CC1|TO STEP DOWN TODAY AND I WILL   
20110129115309.000|20110129115315.000|CC1|DESIGNATE A NEW GOVERNMENT AS OF
